title: Understanding Data Governance
text: Data governance involves managing data availability, usability, integrity, and security. It helps organizations make informed decisions by providing a framework for data management.

title: Converting Uncertainty to Risk
text: By establishing clear data policies and procedures, data governance helps organizations identify potential risks and manage them effectively, turning uncertainty into manageable risks.

hintAnswer: by helping convert uncertainty to risk
title: Choosing the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes how data governance aids organizational maturity?
choices: by creating more "busy work" for attorneys who would otherwise block risky projects
by helping convert uncertainty to risk
by creating the illusion of privacy for regulators
by creating so much process that exhausted engineers can't find the time to make mistakes
